name: vue-slider-input
author: Irteza Asad <irtezaasad@gmail.com>
description: VueSliderInput is a highly customizable and user-friendly slider component for Vue 3, designed to enhance user experience with interactive and visually appealing sliders. This versatile slider component comes with a tooltip feature, making it ideal for applications requiring precise input and feedback, such as pricing selections, age selection, and more.
